scripts.pm2-dev: sudo pm2 start src/server/server.js --watch --env development --node-args="--debug=5858" --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss" --interpreter babel-node
scripts.dev: yarn stop && sudo pm2 flush && yarn pm2-dev && sudo pm2 logs
scripts.pm2-dev-cluster: sudo pm2 start src/server/server.js -i 0 --watch --env development --node-args="--debug=5858" --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss" --interpreter babel-node
scripts.dev-cluster: yarn stop && sudo pm2 flush && yarn pm2-dev-cluster && sudo pm2 logs
scripts.pm2-prod: sudo pm2 start build/server/server.js --env production --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
scripts.prod: yarn stop && yarn build-server && sudo pm2 flush && yarn pm2-prod && sudo pm2 logs
scripts.pm2-prod-cluster: sudo pm2 start build/server/server.js -i 0 --env production --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
scripts.prod-cluster: yarn stop && yarn build-server && sudo pm2 flush && yarn pm2-prod-cluster && sudo pm2 logs
scripts.pm2-prod-debug: sudo pm2 start build/server/server.js --watch --env development --node-args="--debug=5858" --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
scripts.prod-debug: yarn stop && yarn build-server && sudo pm2 flush && yarn pm2-prod-debug && sudo pm2 logs
scripts.pm2-prod-debug-cluster: sudo pm2 start build/server/server.js -i 0 --watch --env development --node-args="--debug=5858" --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
scripts.prod-debug-cluster: yarn stop && yarn build-server && sudo pm2 flush && yarn pm2-prod-debug-cluster && sudo pm2 logs
scripts.pm2-update: sudo yarn global add pm2@latest && sudo pm2 update
scripts.add-global-packages: sudo yarn global add pm2@latest flow-bin@latest babel-cli@latest
scripts.add-eslint: sudo yarn add --dev eslint eslint-plugin-react babel-eslint
scripts.add-babel-presets: sudo yarn add --dev babel-preset-latest babel-preset-flow babel-preset-react babel-preset-stage-2
scripts.add-babel: sudo yarn add --dev babel-core && sudo yarn add babel-runtime && yarn add-babel-plugins && yarn add-babel-presets
scripts.add-webpack-css-loaders: sudo yarn add --dev style-loader css-loader postcss-loader precss
scripts.add-webpack: sudo yarn add --dev webpack && yarn add-webpack-css-loaders && yarn add-webpack-loaders && yarn add-webpack-dev
scripts.add-local-packages: yarn add-express && yarn add-react && yarn add-eslint && yarn add-stylelint && yarn add-babel && yarn add-webpack
